summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Volume 6 of Plats, Page 20 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone a portion of the property located at 7000 Woodlawn Avenue NE from NC2-40' and C1- 40', to NC2-65' / P2; and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Conner Homes, C.F. 304511 Appl. 2002716).
